backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and mounting the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app initializing IndexedDB and providing routing and theming.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper with header, theme toggle, content area, and mobile nav.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDeleteDia: Reusable alert dialog for confirming destructive delete actions.
frontend/src/components/DateSelector.tsx: Reusable date input component with calendar icon and label.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with icons and active state styling.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button to switch between light and dark themes using context.
frontend/src/features/accounting/Account: Form for creating or editing accounting transactions with validation.
Displays accounting transactions with totals and provides edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/features/accounting/calcula: Computes total income, expenses, and balance from a list of accounting transactions.
frontend/src/features/accounting/validat: Validates accounting form fields for required values and positive numeric amounts.
Reusable animated card showing a KPI value, title, and icon.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/kpis.ts: Calculates daily dashboard KPIs using accounting totals, vehicle logs, and water tank entries.
frontend/src/features/reports/Accounting: Loads accounting transactions for a date, displays them in a table, and supports PDF/Excel export.
frontend/src/features/reports/ExportActi: Dropdown component providing buttons to export reports to PDF or Excel.
frontend/src/features/reports/VehicleWor: Shows vehicle work logs for a date with totals and export options for PDF/Excel.
frontend/src/features/reports/WaterTankR: Displays water tank entries for a date with export functionality.
frontend/src/features/vehicleWork/calcul: Contains helper functions to compute working hours and payment amounts.
frontend/src/features/vehicleWork/valida: Validates vehicle work log input fields and returns error messages for missing or invalid data.
frontend/src/features/vehicleWork/Vehicl: Form for creating or editing vehicle work logs with live hour and payment calculations.
Displays vehicle work logs with totals and provides edit/delete actions with a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/features/waterTank/validati: Validates water tank form data, ensuring required fields are provided.
frontend/src/features/waterTank/WaterTan: Form component for creating or editing water tank entries with validation and submission handling.
Renders a list of water tank entries with optional notes and edit/delete controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout functions, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom warm color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/export/excel.ts: Generates CSV content from table data and triggers a file download as a .csv file.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for export metadata, columns, rows, and totals.
frontend/src/lib/export/pdf.ts: Builds a printable HTML document from table data and uses the browser print dialog to export as PDF.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Provides safe formatting helpers for currency, numbers, dates, and time, plus utilities for current date/time.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge Tailwind and conditional class names.
frontend/src/localDb/client.ts: Implements IndexedDB initialization and CRUD helpers for getting, adding, updating, and deleting records.
frontend/src/localDb/index.ts: Re-exports database initialization, repositories, and local DB types as the public API.
frontend/src/localDb/migrations.ts: Contains migration logic to create initial IndexedDB stores and future version handling.
frontend/src/localDb/repositories/accoun: Provides CRUD functions for accounting transactions using the shared DB client.
frontend/src/localDb/repositories/vehicl: Provides CRUD functions for vehicle work logs using the shared DB client.
frontend/src/localDb/repositories/waterT: Provides CRUD functions for water tank entries using the shared DB client.
frontend/src/localDb/schema.ts: Defines DB name, version, store names, and schema metadata interfaces.
frontend/src/localDb/types.ts: Declares local-only TypeScript types for water tank entries, vehicle work logs, and accounting transactions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountingPage.tsx: Implements the accounting page with date filtering, CRUD operations, list display, and a form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Loads today's KPIs from local DB data and displays them in dashboard KPI cards.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Renders a reports page with a date selector and tabbed views for water tank, vehicle work, and accounting reports.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleWorkPage.tsx: Provides CRUD UI for vehicle work logs with date filtering, listing, and a dialog form for adding or editing logs.
frontend/src/pages/WaterTankPage.tsx: Manages water tank entries with date-based filtering, list display, and a dialog form for creating or editing entries.
frontend/src/router.tsx: Defines the appâ€™s route tree including dashboard, water tank, vehicle work, accounting, and reports pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/theme/theme.ts: Provides theme mode types and helpers for reading, writing, and detecting stored or system theme preferences.
frontend/src/theme/ThemeProvider.tsx: Implements a theme context provider that persists light/dark mode and applies it to the document root.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, architecture notes, features, and versioned state.
